item.title: OPRAmachine
item.description: Winner of the 2019 Excellence in Local News Award OPRAmachine won in the “Innovate Local” category for the site’s innovative approach to public records. Details about the award are available here. Opening up New Jersey government OPRAmachine.com is a first of its kind government transparency project that I recently launched to serve the citizens of the state of New Jersey. The site is powered by the New Jersey Open Public Records Act (OPRA), a freedom of information law that allows any citizen of the state to request public records from state and local government agencies.
